description: The Blue Indigo Foundation is dedicated to the restoration and care of coral reefs in San Andrés and the Caribbean. Founded by three passionate individuals, including María Fernanda Maya, the initiative focuses on innovative coral treatment, sexual reproduction, and educational outreach. Collaborating with universities and various stakeholders, the foundation aims to enhance marine life and food security while promoting environmental awareness. Their long-term projects emphasize sustainability and community involvement, making a significant impact on the region.
name: Blue Indigo Foundation
